# WTF am I playing?

[![CI status](https://github.com/krmax44/serial-soundboard/workflows/build/badge.svg)](https://github.com/krmax44/playing.wtf/actions/new)
[![Code coverage](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/github/krmax44/playing.wtf?token=RcYyQnebV1)](https://github.com/krmax44/playing.wtf/actions/new)
[![Go to playing.wtf](https://img.shields.io/badge/url-playing.wtf-blue?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://playing.wtf)
![Cool domain badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/cool%20domain-heck%20yea-success)

Input notes on a virtual keyboard or fretboard (or soon via MIDI) and get the note names, intervals and chords.
